extendedIngredients.name: all purpose flour
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 tbsp all purpose flour/maida or whole wheat flour/atta

extendedIngredients.aisle: Pasta and Rice;Canned and Jarred;Ethnic Foods
extendedIngredients.name: chickpeas
fresh coriander leaves
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 tbsp fresh parsley or coriander leaves, finely chopped or minced

extendedIngredients.name: garlic
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2-3 garlic/lahsun, crushed or finely chopped or minced

extendedIngredients.name: onion
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 medium sized onion/pyaaz, finely chopped or minced

extendedIngredients.name: red pepper powder
extendedIngredients.originalString: Â½ tsp crushed black pepper or pepper powder

recipes.title: falafel , how to make falafel | falafel with chickpeas
recipes.instructions: combine all the ingredients in a bowl.mash the chickpeas and mix everything well.form into small or medium sized balls or pattiesdeep fry in hot oil like the way you would do for pakoras/fritters.turn over to the other side whilst frying to ensure that the falafels are evenly fried.drain falafel on kitchen tissues to remove excess oil.serve falafel hot with pita bread or serve as snack/starter with some sauce.

steps.step: combine all the ingredients in a bowl.mash the chickpeas and mix everything well.form into small or medium sized balls or pattiesdeep fry in hot oil like the way you would do for pakoras/fritters.turn over to the other side whilst frying to ensure that the falafels are evenly fried.drain falafel on kitchen tissues to remove excess oil.serve falafel hot with pita bread or serve as snack/starter with some sauce.
